pr_title: adds protocol tests for self closing tag and empty xml tag

timeline.message: adds protocol tests for self closing tag and empty xml tag

timeline.bodyText: Note that these tests are not client-specific, so there's no need to change this language. If this is a concern, then I suggest we start using sentences like "Tests for XML list serialization".
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.bodyText: Lots of these tests seem to be testing for different possibilities that clients need to handle, but they don't seem like something a service could actually implement. Can you add a client-only tag to client-specific tests to indicate that they are client-specific tests? Like this one: https://github.com/awslabs/smithy/blob/master/smithy-aws-protocol-tests/model/restXml/http-query.smithy#L303
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.message: protocol test for blob shape for self closing/ empty xml tag
feedback to use client-only tag for client specific tests

timeline.bodyText: These also should probably be isolated with the client only tag
timeline.author: JordonPhillips

timeline.message: make serializer test for xml empty string client-only
